question: [Study] English: Compute the area and perimeter of the triangle defined by (170, 116), (110, 175), (134, 183).

qas.question: [Study] English: Compute the area and perimeter of the triangle defined by (170, 116), (110, 175), (134, 183).
[Rapid] Turkce: (170, 116), (110, 175), (134, 183) noktalarindan olusan ucgenin alanini ve cevresini hesapla. Provide only the area.
[Focus] Portugues: Calcule a area e o perimetro do triangulo definido por (170, 116), (110, 175), (134, 183). Provide only the perimeter.
